questions.question: Set in the East Blue, this arc features Luffy's first encounter with a Marine Captain known for his iron mace. What is...?
In this arc, the Straw Hat Pirates face a challenge against a Warlord of the Sea known for his ability to turn people into toys. What is...?
This arc sees the Straw Hat Pirates participating in a gladiator-style tournament on an island ruled by a Warlord of the Sea. What is...?
This Devil Fruit ability allows the user to turn their body parts into weapons. What is...?
This technique, used by Brook, involves using the cold of the underworld to freeze opponents. What is...?
This technique used by Luffy in Gear Fourth involves inflating his muscles and using Haki to maintain form. What is...?
This member of the Straw Hat Pirates is a skilled swordsman who wields three swords and aspires to become the world's greatest swordsman. Who is...?
Known for his 'Fire Fist' attack, this character is the sworn brother of the Straw Hat Pirates' captain and had the Flame-Flame Fruit. Who is...?
This character, the former captain of the Heart Pirates, is known for his ability to grant eternal youth with the Ope Ope no Mi. Who is...?
